footer.title: Discover the future of banking technology in one place!

hero.text: Expo Banking – the premier platform for banks and financial institutions to showcase the latest technologies, services, and business opportunities. Join us to explore the heart of modern finance

about.title: About the Event
about.text: Expo Banking – the premier platform for banks and financial institutions to showcase the latest technologies, services, and business opportunities. Join us to explore the heart of modern finance

items.title: Innovative Technologies
items.text: Expo Banking presents innovative technologies and digital services, providing opportunities for companies to explore and develop cutting-edge technologies.

items.title: Global Community
items.text: The global community of Expo Banking unites leaders of the world's top financial institutions, fostering innovation and collaboration in the development of modern finance.

items.title: Global Partners
items.text: Leading global banks and financial institutions partner with Expo Banking to showcase their latest innovations and business opportunities, driving the development of modern finance.

cards.title: Smart Cities and Banking Summit
cards.text: Smart Cities and Banking Summit is a global platform for discussing the integration of modern cities and financial institutions. The forum will bring together representatives of banks and cities to discuss the opportunities for cooperation and innovation.

cards.title: Mobile Banking Revolution Expo
cards.text: Mobile Banking Revolution Expo is an exhibition exhibition platform for showcasing the latest mobile banking technologies and innovations. The event will bring together representatives of mobile banking industry to discuss the opportunities and challenges of mobile banking.

cards.title: Payment Systems innovation Forum
cards.text: Payment Systems Innovation Forum is a global platform for discussing the latest innovations in payment systems. The forum will bring together representatives of payment systems industry to discuss the opportunities and challenges of payment systems.

cards.title: Global Fintech Forum 2025
cards.text: Global Fintech Forum 2025 is a global platform for discussing the latest innovations in fintech industry. The forum will bring together representatives of fintech industry to discuss the opportunities and challenges of fintech industry.

items.title: Venue Details
items.text: The Expo Bank will take place at the state-of-the-art Epo Expo Center — a modern venue equipped with world-class facilities for conferences, exhibitions, and networking

organizer.title: About the Organizer
organizer.text: Expo Bank is organized by Epo Bank Association, a leading financial organization in Uzbekistan dedicated to driving innovation, collaboration, and growth in the banking and fintech sector.

items.title: Mission
items.text: Our mission is to create a platform where banks, financial institutions, startups, educators, and government bodies come together to share knowledge, explore new technologies, and shape the future of finance.

items.title: Our Role
details: Hosting Uzbekistan’s largest international banking and fintech exhibition
Connecting global industry leaders with local partners
Supporting education, financial literacy, and youth opportunities
Showcasing the latest products, services, and digital solutions

items.title: Partners & Sponsors
items.text: The Expo Bank is made possible with the support of strategic partners, sponsors, and government institutions. Together, we ensure an impactful and successful event

sidebar.title: Directory of banks

items.title: About company
items.text: InfinBANK – one of the leading commercial banks in Uzbekistan, provides modern financial services to clients. The bank has introduced a wide range of services not only for individuals but also for corporate clients. InfinBANK develops digital banking to create convenience for clients by offering mobile apps and online services

media-accreditation.name: Media accreditation

items.title: Dear Representatives of the Mass Media
items.text: In accordance with the legislative requirements of the Republic of Uzbekistan, the decision on the accreditation of temporary foreign correspondents may take up to two weeks.

items.title: All media representatives will be notified of the accreditation decision by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
items.text: Representatives of the mass media, who are not accredited in Uzbekistan, must be accredited by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Uzbekistan.

media-accreditation.available: The accreditation procedure for representatives of foreign countries in Uzbekistan is available here:

items.question: Do I need to register online?
items.answer: Yes, all visitors are required to register online before attending the Expo.

items.question: Is entry free for students?
items.answer: Yes, students can enter for free by presenting a valid student ID at registration.

items.question: Where do I get my badge?
items.answer: You can collect your badge at the registration desk upon arrival by showing your confirmation email or QR code.

items.question: Can families attend together?
items.answer: Yes, families are welcome. Each member must complete individual registration.

items.question: What are the exhibition opening hours?
items.answer: The exhibition is open daily from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM during event dates.

items.question: Is there parking available at the venue?
items.answer: Yes, free parking is available for registered visitors on a first-come, first-served basis.

items.question: Will there be translation services?
items.answer: Yes, simultaneous translation will be provided for major sessions in English, Russian, and Uzbek.

items.question: Can I attend specific sessions without visiting the exhibition floor?
items.answer: Yes, session-only passes are available, but registration is still required.

terms-of-service.subtitle: Welcome to Bank Expo! By accessing or using this website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please refrain from using the site.

content.title: Use of the Website
texts: You must be at least 18 years old to use this website.
You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of third parties or restrict their use of the website.
Unauthorized use of this website may give rise to a claim for damages or constitute a criminal offense.

content.title: Intellectual Property Rights
texts: All content on this website, including text, images, logos, and code, is owned by or licensed to Bank Expo.
You may not reproduce, distribute, or otherwise exploit website content without prior written consent.

content.title: User Account
texts: If you create an account, you are responsible for keeping your login details secure.
You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to your account.
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

content.title: Limitation of Liability
texts: The website is provided on an 'as is' basis without warranties of any kind.
Bank Expo is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of this site.

content.title: Governing Law
texts: These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Uzbekistan.

privacy-policy.subtitle: At Bank Expo, we value your privacy and are committed to safeguarding your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.

content.title: Information We Collect
texts: Personal details you provide, such as name, email, phone number, and company information.
Technical information like IP address, browser type, and device data collected automatically.
Cookies and tracking technologies used to improve your browsing experience.

content.title: How We Use Your Information
texts: To provide, operate, and improve our services and website.
To send you event updates, service announcements, and promotional offers.
To comply with legal obligations and prevent fraudulent activities.

content.title: Data Sharing & Third Parties
texts: We do not sell or rent your personal data.
We may share information with trusted service providers (e.g., IT, payment processing) when necessary.
Third-party websites linked on our site are subject to their own privacy practices.

content.title: Data Security
texts: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data.
However, no method of internet transmission is 100% secure, and absolute protection cannot be guaranteed.

content.title: Your Rights
texts: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data.
You can opt out of promotional communications at any time.

content.title: Changes to This Policy
texts: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
